logout.title: Sign Out
logout.confirm: Are you sure to sign out?

history.title: History
history.warning: History is stored locally in your browser and not uploaded. Switching devices or clearing browser data may lose history.

messages.password_invalid: Password must be 6–16 chars, include letters and numbers; allowed symbols: ＠ . _ - ! # $ % ^ & *
messages.auth_expired: Session expired, please sign in again
messages.auth_required: Not signed in, please sign in first
messages.service_error: Service error, please try again later
messages.new_pwd_len: New password must be at least 6 characters

share.tip: Share links are valid for 30 minutes with 5 previews. Please save images in time.
share.copied_ready: Share link copied, ready to send

overlay.text: Drive image creation and editing with text: generate, inpaint, style transfer and outpainting are all supported. Coralsum keeps character consistency and scene coherence, fast and stable details.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe your idea to generate an image
prompt.desc: Describe what you want to generate or edit in natural language. Include subject, style, composition and tone with clear constraints and details.

image_input.title: Input Images
image_input.tip: Drag, select or paste one or more reference images to assist generation or editing. PNG/JPG recommended.

system_prompt.title: System Prompt
system_prompt.tip: High-level instructions to constrain style, behavior and safety. Keep objective and concise.
system_prompt.placeholder: Set style, lighting or details for better understanding

estimate.tip: Estimate based on current config and pricing. Actual deduction depends on result.

model_type.title: Model Type
model_type.tip: Choose model type: Pro for higher quality, Basic for economy.

candidate.title: Candidates
candidate.tip: Number of returned candidates. More takes longer and costs more. Choose 1–4 appropriately.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.tip: Manage aspect ratio, temperature, media resolution, reasoning level, image size, top-p, output format and upscayl.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.tip: Auto: use the original ratio of input images. Or choose fixed ratios (1:1, 16:9 etc) for scenes.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.tip: Controls randomness; low is stable/controllable, high is creative/divergent. Recommend ≥1.0 for richer details.

image_size.title: Image Size
image_size.tip: Choose base output resolution. Higher is clearer, longer and costlier.

top_p.title: Top-P
top_p.tip: Nucleus sampling threshold for diversity; higher is richer, lower is conservative. Adjust for quality vs diversity.

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.tip: Choose final format: PNG (lossless, transparency) or JPG (smaller size).

upscayl.title: Upscayl
upscayl.tip: AI-based super-resolution and detail reconstruction; higher scale increases time and cost.
upscayl.warn: High scales significantly increase compute and waiting. Prefer lower scales first.

real_scene.title: Realistic Scenes
real_scene.desc: Use photographic terms: mention angle, lens, lighting and details to guide realistic outputs.

stickers.title: Stylized Illustrations & Stickers
stickers.desc: For stickers/icons/assets, specify style and require transparent background.

text_accuracy.title: Accurate Text in Images
text_accuracy.desc: Clearly specify the text, font style (descriptive) and overall design.

product_photography.title: Product Mockups & Commercial Photography
product_photography.desc: Great for e-commerce, advertising or branding with clean professional shots.

minimal_style.title: Minimalism & Negative Space
minimal_style.desc: Ideal for backgrounds in websites, slides or marketing where text overlays.

sequential_art.title: Sequential Art (Comics/Storyboard)
sequential_art.desc: Focus on character consistency and scene descriptions for visual storytelling.

use_search.title: Use Search to Ground
use_search.desc: Generate based on up-to-date or real-time info for news, weather and timely topics.

add_remove.title: Add & Remove Elements
add_remove.desc: Provide an image and describe changes; model matches style, lighting and perspective.

inpaint.title: Inpaint (Semantic Mask)
inpaint.desc: Define a mask via conversation to edit specific regions while keeping others unchanged.

style_transfer.title: Style Transfer
style_transfer.desc: Provide an image to recreate its content in another artistic style.

advanced_composition.title: Advanced Composition: Combine Images
advanced_composition.desc: Provide multiple images as context to create composite scenes (product mockups, collages).

high_fidelity.title: High-Fidelity Detail Retention
high_fidelity.desc: Describe key details (faces, logos) explicitly to preserve them during edits.

bring_to_life.title: Bring Sketches to Life
bring_to_life.desc: Upload sketches and let the model refine them into finished images.

character_consistency.title: Character Consistency: 360° Views
character_consistency.desc: Iterate prompts for different angles; include previous outputs as references to keep consistency.

concretize.title: Concretize:
concretize.desc: Be specific for more control. Prefer detailed descriptions over vague terms.

context_intent.title: Provide Context & Intent:
context_intent.desc: Explain usage. Context influences outputs (e.g., brand logo for minimal skincare vs. generic logo).

iterate.title: Iterate & Refine:
iterate.desc: Use conversational edits. e.g., 'warmer lighting' or 'keep all but make expression more serious'.

stepwise.title: Use Stepwise Instructions:
stepwise.desc: Break complex scenes into steps: background → foreground → focal item.

negative_prompt.title: Semantic Negative Prompts:
negative_prompt.desc: Describe desired absence positively (e.g., 'empty street with no signs of traffic').

control_camera.title: Control Camera:
control_camera.desc: Use photo/cinema language like wide-angle shot, macro shot, low-angle perspective.

msg.select_or_save_first: Please select or save a config first
msg.gen_count_range: Generate count must be between 1 and 200

import_modal.title: Batch Import
import_modal.desc: JSON array; each item: name, prompt, description (optional), category (optional), tags (array, optional), tipsNeedImage, tipsNeedProModel, tipsNeedEditPrompt
